updates.title: PCWStats - Update Number #22
updates.description: Complete patch notes for update v0.0.0256, No. #22, issued on 16 May, 2025.

changed: Tweaked share code behavior and UI in strat planner

Path issue with image in latest news post

updates.author: PCWStats Team

Fact descriptions in Fun Facts section

Fun fact description for team member counter
Styles for Fun Stats about PCWStats section
Coffee cup counter is now dynamic

Conclusion section renamed to Tank Summary
Improved Strengths & Weaknesses section in tank pages
